meanings.definition: A small part or quantity intended to show what the whole is like.
meanings.sent1: I took a sampled of the cake to taste it.
meanings.sent2: The teacher showed us a sampled of the new book.
meanings.sent3: The tiny toy car was a cute sampled of the real one.
meanings.sent4: Her bracelet was a sampled of her elegant jewelry collection.
meanings.sent5: The mini cupcake was a delicious sampled of the bakery's treats.

meanings.definition: To take a sample or samples of.
meanings.sent1: She sampled the soup before adding more salt.
meanings.sent2: The scientist sampled the water from different sources.
meanings.sent3: He sampled the ice cream flavors before choosing one.
meanings.sent4: The musician sampled various beats to create a new song.
meanings.sent5: The chef sampled the spices to find the perfect blend.
